QuestData.Title: Arcane Legacy
QuestData.Description: The rage of the elements has unearthed a hidden Highborne city in the heart of Stonetalon Mountains.$B$BDirectly southwest of here, through Sishir Canyon, you will find the Ruins of Eldre'thar. Within the ruins lie treasures untouched by mortals for ten thousand years!$B$BTake this device and use it on the Highborne ghosts that inhabit the ruins. It will... put their souls to rest and also collect valuable data which I may peruse at a later date.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Highborne Prison to bind 5 Highborne Spirits.
QuestData.RewardText: I assure you, simpleton, the spirits you captured are at rest. Do not let their protests move you.
